sys_atf_test.description:
This test should be identical to the When needed - Past test, except it tests a When needed field value that is today When needed date is today: javascript:gs.minutesAgo(-20) The Record Insert test step should fail. Update the Log test step to indicate that the test is expected to fail.
Test generated from template. To complete this test do the following: 1. Create a user with specified roles and groups for impersonation. 2. Insert a record to the table. 3. Select a record and validate field values. 4. Log an output.
sys_atf_test.name: When needed - Today
